channel.title: Walking on Ken's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Walking on Ken's Blog

item.title: A very short walk
item.description: An even shorter walk around campus today than yesterday; you will see why from the pictures. The walk around the back of the residences was still passable this afternoon. Here is the substation and dilapidated truck mentioned elsewhere: I wondered what this was in the woods, until I remembered that this is a university and there are usually unusual art projects in unusual places. This was just around the corner from the substation:
